keyword: how many calories in a spoon of brown sugar
title: How Many Calories in a Spoon of Brown Sugar?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a spoon of brown sugar, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition breakdown per teaspoon basis with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Spoon of Brown Sugar?
assumptions: Assuming 1 level teaspoon (4 g) of packed brown sugar; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, packing density, moisture content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A spoon of brown sugar contains about 15 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a spoon of brown sugar?
faqs.a: About 15 kcal for one level teaspoon (4 g).

faqs.q: Is brown sugar higher in calories than white?
faqs.a: Similar; both around 15 kcal per teaspoon, but brown has slight molasses flavor.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a spoon of brown sugar?
faqs.a: Nearly 4 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber or protein.

faqs.q: Does packing affect calories in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Yes; a packed teaspoon adds ~3 kcal due to more sugar (about 5 g).

faqs.q: How does brown sugar nutrition compare per 100 g?
faqs.a: About 380 kcal, 98 g carbs (97 g sugars), 0 g fat or protein per 100 g.
